paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for BRCA2, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The rare BRCA2 UV c.5332G>A/p.Asp1778Asn was found here for the first time in co-occurrence in trans with the deleterious BRCA1 mutation c.798_799delTT/p.Ser267LysfsX19 in young breast cancer patient.

functional_data.summary: Identified as likely pathogenic based on damaging PSIC score from PolyPhen2.

variants.segregation_data: Segregates with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: Found in co-occurrence with a known deleterious BRCA1 mutation.
key_quotes: The rare BRCA2 UV c.5332G>A/p.Asp1778Asn was found here for the first time in co-occurrence in trans with the deleterious BRCA1 mutation c.798_799delTT/p.Ser267LysfsX19 in young breast cancer patient.

functional_data.summary: Showed a damaging PSIC score yielded by PolyPhen2 program.

variants.additional_notes: Identified as a new missense UV.
key_quotes: six BRCA2 (c.1099G>A/p.Asp367Asn, c.2636C>A/p.Ser879Tyr, c.3868T>A/p.Cys1290Ser, c.5428G>T/p.Val1810Phe, c.6346C>G/p.His2116Asp and c.9256G>A/p.Gly3086Arg) located respectively in exons 10, 11 and 24, show a damaging PSIC score yielded by PolyPhen2 program and could be pathogenic.
